page.para: This is So/ni/a. So/ni/a is a teach/er.
This is Dee/pak. Eve/ry/one loves his ra/di/o show.
Dee/pak is blind. But he is great at talk/ing a/bout mu/sic.
This is Var/sha. She is a farm/er.
Var/sha can/not hear. She speaks us/ing sign lan/guage.
This is He/manth. He is great at foot/ball.
He/manth has no hands. But he scores lots of goals for his team!
